ygData.subject: Re: Why I don't play a Warrior
ygData.msgSnippet: Geez - this is the silliest email I have read in a long time. A cleric wouldn t stand and fight a griffin while the rest of his party ran to the zone.  Only a
ygData.messageBody:
Geez - this is the silliest email I have read in a long time.

A cleric wouldn't stand and fight a griffin while the rest of his party ran
to the zone. Only a true warrior with a heart of stone would freely give
his life for the protection of others.

Kill everything that is attacking your spellcasters, and die if necessary to
protect your friends.

A warrior is not just a killer, or a tank - he the living example of honor
and justice.
